##Description
Sample factor heritibilties from a discrete set on [0,1). Prior places 50% of the weight at h2=0. Samples conditional on F, marginalizes over U.

##Usage
sample_h2s_discrete(Factors, eig_ZAZ)

##Arguments
Factors\
eig_ZAZ

##Value
Factors
